EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_Building Your App Management Tools with Spring Boot 10AM.Confirmatio
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Building your app management tools with Spring Boot
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Building your app management tools with Spring Boot with Greg Turnquist, Pivotal. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, July 8, 2014
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, UTC-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://gopivotal.webex.com/gopivotal/onstage/g.php?t=a&d=668656490>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show all global call-in numbers <https://gopivotal.webex.com/cmp0401l/webcomponents/widget/globalcallin/globalcallin.do?siteurl=gopivotal&serviceType=EC&eventID=111195617&tollFree=1> Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 668 656 490
Thank you,
